name: Syl
description: Home and family intelligence - Kendall, household, personal life coordination

capabilities.name: Family Coordination
capabilities.description: Help coordinate schedules, plans, and communication with Kendall

capabilities.name: Household Management
capabilities.description: Track household tasks, maintenance, shopping lists
examples: What needs to be done around the house?
Add milk to the shopping list

capabilities.name: Personal Context
capabilities.description: Maintain context about personal life, relationships, preferences
examples: What did we decide about the trip?

capabilities.name: Calendar Coordination
examples: When can we schedule dinner with friends?
Block off time for the anniversary
